meanings.english_definition: Relating to both the thyroid cartilage and the hyoid bone.
A small quadrilateral muscle in the neck which depresses the hyoid bone or elevates the larynx.

etymology.value: From the Greek words "thyreo-" (shield, referring to the thyroid cartilage) + "hyo-" (U-shaped, referring to the hyoid bone) + "-oid" (resembling).
